tables.title: Dockside Events
tables.description: What happens as ships come and go from the frontier hub.

entries.result: A freighter captain auctions unused cargo space for discreet packages.
An inspector waves a radiation wand wildly, panicking passengers.
Dockworkers strike briefly when loader mechs lock up simultaneously.
A shuttle limps in with scorch marks, refusing to explain the chase.
An alien pilgrim distributes glowing seedlings that hum near starship engines.
Customs officers deploy sniffers for contraband biotech and find something alive.
A merchant guild offers hazard pay for an escort through a meteor swarm.
A famous racer lands unexpectedly, drawing crowds and illegal betting.
Dock sirens blare after someone broadcasts an unauthorized distress call.
A diplomatic courier requests help swapping hull plates to avoid recognition.
A cargo container bursts open, revealing dormant stasis pods.
A meteorite souvenir stand suddenly magnetizes every nearby tool.

tables.title: Unearthed Artifacts
tables.description: Curious relics from beyond human science.

entries.result: A translucent cube that refracts sound, distorting voices in its presence.
A ring of flexible metal that hums near strong emotions.
A scroll of living fibers that rearranges its symbols every hour.
A palm-sized orb that projects gravitational lensing when warmed.
A crystalline lattice that stores a single spoken sentence indefinitely.
A vial of liquid that crawls uphill when exposed to starlight.
A mask that overlays holographic constellations onto the wearer's vision.
A tablet that only boots when held with exactly three other beings.
A shard that pulls magnetic north toward an uncharted sector.
A broken drone wing etched with fractal maps of subterranean tunnels.

tables.title: Crew Tensions
tables.description: Interpersonal friction aboard ships or in tight habitats.

entries.result: Two engineers argue over whether to sell spare parts to pirates for rent money.
A medic hides contraband samples in the galley freezer to avoid lab audits.
A pilot fears someone tampered with their neural link and refuses to launch.
A steward secretly broadcasts a soap opera starring the crew using helmet cams.
A navigator wants to divert course to check on a distress ping from family.
The quartermaster's ledger shows supplies missing only on even-numbered days.
A botanist's experimental pollen causes unexpected allergic outbursts.
A rookie marine boasts about selling mission intel to afford debt payments.

tables.title: Glitches in Transit
tables.description: Technical surprises that complicate travel scenes.

entries.result: Jump capacitors charge unevenly, forcing a tense manual synchronization.
A guidance AI overlays ancient star charts on modern nav data.
Inertial dampeners hiccup mid-maneuver, tossing cargo and crew.
Life-support filters clog with shimmering dust that resists scanners.
A coolant leak crystalizes in microgravity, forming blades near conduits.
Auxiliary thrusters fire in a repeating rhythm like a coded message.

tables.title: Uncanny Transmissions
tables.description: Broadcasts and pings that hint at larger plots.

entries.result: A repeating SOS encoded in an extinct dialect, growing stronger nightly.
A beacon sends coordinates that align with no known orbital path.
A weather buoy transmits lullabies mixed with navigation data.
An encrypted transmission uses outdated military ciphers from two factions.
A sensor net keeps detecting a ship that is always just behind the horizon.
A survey probe returns with its memory wiped except for a single star map.
Two satellites broadcast contradictory descriptions of the same planet.
An old pirate song plays over comms whenever the crew discusses coordinates.
